DOC.brief_summary: Compare the abuse liabilities of Staccato Alprazolam, oral immediate-release alprazolam, and Staccato Placebo.
DOC.criteria: Male and female subjects between the ages of 18 to 55 years, inclusive, who have a history of substance abuse or dependence on barbiturates and/or benzodiazepine receptor agonists for their intoxicating effects Subjects with a significant current psychiatric illness or taking any psychotropic prescription medications for therapeutic uses.
